post.body: I used to engage in hypnosis duels with Kenrick Cleveland who seems to have vanished from twitter and planet earth.
I'm not a big guru since I lost all my weight.
Heading to bed. To be continued.
Okay, how are you getting that many people to that site? And how many are taking the quiz? How big is that list?
And as you breathe in, your index finger types in www.fingerhealing.com so you can send me your money.
That site does 15K a month? What are you selling of your own? How are u getting traffic?
You already have super powers...
Yes, I have to post a few days of winners. We have the DVDs ready to go out!
Kind of dangerous there.
Watch your wallet in Delray Beach. Just a word of advice.
Well, as you remember clearly to send me your money, you'll feel and overwhelming desire to buy my products.
I'm just warming up.
I will be in LA for Eben's shindig. Planning secret visit to Camp Kern in La Jolla. Yet to be confirmed by @masscontrolkern
I was a legs man in wrestling in high school. My favorite was split scissors. Figure four was for whimps. Split scissors hurt.
Feeling much better today. Even writing again.
Moi? Mean? No. Nasty yes. Let's start a facebook group to send viagra to him.
& you may begin to recall the discussion about video of the sneaky La Jolla day as Jason rubs up against you & Reese's dogs
And the more you fail to recall the message from last Sunday, the more gay images of MoFo appear in your mind. Now.
I wonder how quickly you will notice your impotence growing as you fail to return my phone calls. Perhaps, right now?
Yes, but knowing I read the Gita, they do it in Sanskrit for me.
Yeah, the Diane will get you far. I think I lost them again.
They are. Found them.... Yes!
If people don't follow Maria, she's going to cry. Someone please follow her.
Wait, Day before I'm at secret locale can not reveal on Twitter. Found transcripts you wanted.
You're planning on staying in the room? Rookie.
Okay, I got caught too.
Just wait until you get your tax bill in 2010. Man are you going to be made a me. You're all nice now but just wait.
I think you need @perrymarshall badly.
How come you didn't have a mud slide for me? Sheesh!
Who writes my copy? People in India who write it in Sanskrit and we translate it into English. Didn't someone tell you?
You are a total party pooper. No wonder the tweet up was so poorly attended. Ask @thedeanjackson where to party in Orlando
What ever you do, don't sit next to me at Eben's event. You'll get no work done. Warning.
Not on my list of places for a Super Happy Fun Day.
You go to TGIF and think about healthy food? Name one healthy item on the menu! Mud slides rock.
I'll give you a hint. It's NOT at the seminar. Super Happy Fun Days courtesy of @thedeanjackson
Ask any copywriter. They'll know. (They better) BTW, ask @masscontrolkern where the official hang out is for Eben's seminar.
I use the 33:33 method from Eugene Schwartz
Did u know that over 400 billion dollars is locked in Hedge Funds and the owners refuse to give the money to the investors?
Last post for the night: Check out the 4 videos on www.nlpcopywriting.com Thousands have seen them today. Waiting for my Amazon bill.
Good night world. Got some seriously good copy written. Looks strangely like copy written by a Harry Potter character.
